3891.verse: فَلَمَّآ|Then when|93|104|141$أَسْلَمَا|both of them had submitted|205|227|14679$وَتَلَّهُۥ|and he put him down|159|181|14680$لِلْجَبِينِ|upon his forehead,|143|154|14681$

3892.verse: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ|And We called out to him|187|268|11226$أَن|that|48|210|655$يَـٰٓإِبْرَٲهِيمُ|`O Ibrahim!|106|187|8629$

3893.verse: قَدْ|Verily,|61|77|1097$صَدَّقْتَ|you have fulfilled|132|164|14682$ٱلرُّءْيَآ‌ۚ|the vision.`|97|129|10423$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|128|120$كَذَٲلِكَ|thus|77|109|702$نَجْزِى|[We] reward|103|119|5793$ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ|the good-doers.|127|127|556$

3900.verse: وَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ|And We gave him glad tidings|215|226|14686$بِإِسْحَـٰقَ|of Ishaq,|95|118|8611$نَبِيًّا|a Prophet|84|107|11175$مِّنَ|among|63|86|156$ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|the righteous.|117|128|1197$

3903.verse: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُمَا|And We saved both of them|206|218|14690$وَقَوْمَهُمَا|and their people|127|151|14691$مِنَ|from|50|74|156$ٱلْكَرْبِ|the distress|98|122|11866$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the great,|87|99|996$

3904.verse: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُمْ|And We helped them,|162|232|14692$فَكَانُواْ هُمُ|so they became|126|266|14693$ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ|the victors.|97|167|6680$

3905.verse: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمَا|And We gave both of them|199|268|14694$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|223|451$ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ|the clear.|105|174|14695$

3906.verse: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمَا|And We guided both of them|210|270|14696$ٱلصِّرَٲطَ|(to) the Path|108|229|17$ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ|the Straight.|105|166|18$

3907.verse: وَتَرَكْنَا|And We left|98|132|8864$عَلَيْهِمَا|for both of them,|134|203|2015$فِى|among|63|132|89$ٱلْأَخِرِينَ|the later generations.|164|198|12970$

3913.verse: أَتَدْعُونَ|Do you call|94|116|14699$بَعْلاً|Baal|60|105|14700$وَتَذَرُونَ|and you forsake|126|171|13034$أَحْسَنَ|(the) Best|88|133|6192$ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ|(of) Creators -|118|140|12236$

3914.verse: ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|96|184$رَبَّكُمْ|your Lord|82|162|6461$وَرَبَّ|and (the) Lord|116|196|14701$ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) your forefathers?`|172|212|12905$

3891.verse: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

3893.verse: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

3894.verse: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

3895.verse: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

3896.verse: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3898.verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

3899.verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

3900.verse: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

3901.verse: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

3902.verse: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

3903.verse: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

3904.verse: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

3905.verse: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

3906.verse: And We guided them on the straight path.

3907.verse: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

3909.verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

3910.verse: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

3911.verse: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

3912.verse: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

3913.verse: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

3914.verse: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
